parameters.name: DisplayType
parameters.description: Display setting to check as defined in swViewDisplayType_e

title: IModelView.GetDisplayState
description: Gets the display state of this model view.

parameters.name: DisplayType
parameters.description: Display setting to check as defined in swViewDisplayType_e

returns: True if the setting specified is turned on, false if not
remarks:
By passing in an available DisplayType option, you can check various display conditions for the view. For example, if you want to know if a view is shaded, you could make the following call in Visual Basic:
res = mView.GetDisplayState( swIsViewShaded )
